summary: In 1944 Estonia, a fratricide war ensues when Estonians of the retreating German forces fight against Estonians conscripted into the advancing Soviet Red Army.
cast: Kaspar Velberg|Kristjan Üksküla|Maiken Pius|Gert Raudsep|Hendrik Toompere Jr. Jr.|Karl-Andreas Kalmet|Henrik Kalmet|Pääru Oja|Priit Strandberg|Priit Pius|Märt Pius|Kristo Viiding|Jaak Prints|Magnús Mariuson|Mait Malmsten|Tõnu Oja|Sepo Seeman|Anne Reemann|Anne Margiste|Peeter Jürgen|Eliise Makrjakov|Ain Mäeots|Peeter Tammearu|Rain Simmul|Martin Mill|Ivo Uukkivi|Kristjan Sarv|Andero Ermel|Marko Leht|Priit Loog|Thomas Kolli|Tanel Saar
